attributes.action: Help the girls and women of Afghanistan to get back into education!
attributes.additional_details: The girls and women of Afghanistan can not be forgotten. They deserve an education, they deserved to be heard! I want the UK government to act urgently and make a stand by talking to world leaders about ensuring they take every precaution to secure the futures of the girls and women of Afghanistan.
attributes.background: Stand up for the girls and women of Afghanistan who are under Taliban rule to be able to get back into education

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about the ability of Afghan girls to access education, however it's not clear what 'precautions' you want the UK Government to discuss with other Governments, nor how you want the UK Government to see these implemented.

You could have a petition calling on the UK Government to pressure the Afghan Government to respect Afghan girls' right to education, if that is something you'd like to see happen.

You might also like to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594723
